title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over

editions.title: Modelled unemployment rate aged 16 years and over
editions.summary: Modelled unemployment rate for people aged 16 years and over, Great Britain, 07/2004-06/2005 to 07/2022-06/2023.
editions.description: This dataset shows modelled-based estimates for the proportion of people aged 16 years and over without a job who have been actively seeking work within the last four weeks and are available to start work within the next two weeks
editions.creator: https://staging.idpd.uk/publishers/office-for-national-statistics
